title: Exquisite Corpse
description: A serial killer leaves his prison cell a dead man and rises again to build a new life. His journey takes him to New Orleans' French Quater - to the decadent bars and frivolous boys that haunt the luscious dark corners of a town brought up on Voodoo and the dark arts. Anticipating a willing victim he finds an equal, something he never expected...
author: Poppy Z. Brite
